title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on pale yellow linen. Serpentine flowering branches, mostly red and pink flowers. In the branches many brilliantly colored exotic birds, - green, red, blue, and yellow. Multi-colored butterflies fly among branches. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-27.
